content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case that took place in bari in 2008 the court has awarded a sum of €306800 in favor of the plaintiffs the court has declared that ms dl is the owner of half of the money in a savings account and she is authorized to withdraw €2616822 the court has also declared that the estate of the deceased mr da has a balance of €5233644 with half of it being €2616822 the court has settled the costs of the proceedings in favor of the plaintiffs with a total amount of €306800 the net sum due from the inheritance is €2310022 which will be divided among the spouse and three children the court has ordered the casse di risparmio postali mola di bari agency to make the payments accordingly the costs of the proceedings will be borne by the defendant ms di
